DOC.brief_summary: The present study assesses the health-related quality of life and the locomotor capabilities major traumatic lower limb amputees who use prosthesis.
DOC.brief_title: Traumatic Below-knee Amputees With Prosthetics: Health-related Quality of Life and Locomotor Capabilities
DOC.detailed_description: A cross sectional study based on a retrospective review of prosthetic using major traumatic lower limb amputees' demographic and clinical details together with HRQoL and locomotor capabilities patient-reported outcome measures.
DOC.criteria: 1. Belowknee prosthesis users with amputation due to trauma 2. age >18 1. Patients with no prosthesis
